amendment.description: An amendment numbered 77 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prevent funds made available by this Act from being used to transfer cluster munitions to any foreign country.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 253 (Roll no. 497).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 253 (Roll no. 497).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
